title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-3.11 - Renewal of the permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-3.11 - Renewal of the permit

State Regulations

The provisions of Part 621 of this Title apply to renewal
of permits except where indicated herein: (a) A complete application for permit renewal
must be submitted to the chief permit administrator at least 180 days prior to
the expiration date of the existing permit. (b) The department will mail notice to the
permittee of its decision on the request for renewal on or before 30 calendar
days after the date of receipt of the application except as provided in section
621.11
(f) of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
383-3.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
